metadata.description:
Chapter One of Four. 

Frank Hurt, an undercover agent for the Global Crime Task Force, is sent to infiltrate the criminal organization only known as The Syndicate Six. When his cover is blown and his life destroyed, he wakes up barely a man, his life changed forever. Within the depths of a massive secret facility, alien technology awaits, and a new life and mission for Frank-- revenge and the means to fulfill it.
metadata.name: Killing Machine
